info.role_channel_set: The role channel has been set to: <#{}>
info.mute_role_set: The mute role has been set to: <@&{}>
info.member_log_set: The member log channel has been set to: <#{}>
info.message_log_set: The message log channel has been set to: <#{}>
info.mod_log_set: The moderation log channel has been set to: <#{}>
info.leave_message_none: There is no leave message set.  You can set one with the placeholders <mention>, <username>, <server>.
info.leave_message_set: The current leave message has been set to: {}
info.join_message_none: There is no join message set. You can set one with the placeholders <mention>, <username>, <server>.
info.join_message_set: The current join message has been set to: {}
info.prefix_current: The prefix in this guild is set to: `{}`
info.prefix_set: The prefix for this server has been set to: `{}`
info.prefix_existing: The prefix for this server is already: `{}`
info.prefix_default: The default prefix is set to `{}`
info.max_mention_set: The maximum mention limit was set to `{}`
info.weather_saved_location: Saved your location.  You won't have to pass a location argument to get the weather of this location.
info.notification_sent_dm: Sent you a DM with your notifications. :mailbox_with_mail:
info.list_ids_attached: Server roles have been attached in the file (Exceeded message size limit).
info.gallery_added: A gallery has been added for <#{}>
info.galleries_none: This guild has no gallery channels.
info.fm_saved_username: Saved your username.  You won't have to pass a username argument to get your last.fm info.
info.tag_added: Added a tag named `{}` with response `{}`.
info.tag_edited: Edited `{}` with new name `{}` and response `{}`.

error.unknown_error: Something has gone wrong :(  Try this again maybe?
error.no_role_config: There isn't a role config set.
error.no_mute_role: There isn't a mute role set.
error.no_user_given: Please give a user id or mention.
error.invalid_role: Invalid role id, mention, or name.
error.invalid_rep_option: Invalid rep action, please provide `+` or `-`.
error.invalid_gallery_id: Invalid gallery ID.  Use `gallery list` to get a gallery's ID.
error.prune_too_high: Invalid prune amount, must be between 1 and 99
error.prefix_no_perms: You need `MANAGE_GUILD` permissions to set the prefix.
error.required_number: Given option was not a number.
error.failed_mute_member: Failed to add the mute role to the member.  Maybe I don't have permission.
error.failed_dm: Failed to send DM, maybe you don't have them enabled?
error.google_maps_deserialize_failed: Response body is not in JSON format or it cannot be properly deserialized
error.google_maps_missing_coord: Location data invalid, missing coordinate data.
error.google_maps_missing_address: Location data invalid, missing address data.
error.weather_none_given: Please provide a location to look up the weather.
error.weather_invalid_save: Location missing.  You can save a location with `weather save [location]` or pass a location as an argument.
error.rep_no_args: Give me an action (`+` or `-`) and someone to rep.
error.gallery_failed_delete: Failed to delete gallery, make sure you have a correct gallery ID.
error.notification_delete_by_keyword: Please provide a keyword ID instead of the actual keyword, or try this in the respective guild instead.
error.notification_delete_failed: You don't have that keyword set, or keyword ID is not valid.
error.notification_global_already_exists: You already have this global notification set.
error.notification_already_exists: You already have this notification set
error.fm_no_username: No Last.fm username given or saved.  Pass a username as an argument or use `fm set [username]` to save your username.
error.fm_no_username_mentioned: No Last.fm username found for this user.
error.fm_fetch_error: Something went wrong fetching last.fm data.
error.tag_already_exists: This tag already exists.  Try another name.
error.tag_not_found: There doesn't seem to be a tag named `{}`.
error.tag_not_owner: This tag doesn't belong to you.
error.tag_not_found_or_not_owner: This tag doesn't belong to you or it doesn't exist.
error.tag_content_unchanged: New tag response is unchanged.  You can either edit the name or content of the tag.
